name: Speedy Frogs
description:
Movement = W - Up, S - Down,  A - Left, D - Right

Hello,
it's my first published game on itch.io to game jam.

Game based on "Turbo tunnel" from Battletoads.

Game have simple rules:
1. Avoid oncoming obstacles
2. Eat as many flies as possible you can, and get the best score.

Please leave comment with your opinion and advice for the novice developer.
